website_summaries.verdict: Initial impressions are great, with the handsome form factor and gorgeous display putting up a good front. When you get down to really using the Galaxy Fit, though, its inaccurate heart monitor and lack of GPS tracking take the shine off proceedings. Considering the fact that you can pick up the Galaxy Fit-e for around £50/$50 less and only miss out on wireless charging, the larger colour display, and a few other minor features, or buy the Xiaomi Mi Smart Band 4 or Honor Band 5 for the same discounted price, it’s hard to recommend the expensive Galaxy Fit.
pros: Lovely display, comfortable to wear, good waterproofing
cons: Erratic heart rate monitor, no GPS, expensive when compared to rivals

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit Watch
customer_reviews.text: Time is accurate and automatic. Features are really good - sleep, steps, heartbeat, Kcals burned, stress. Still learning about all the features on it. The strap is fiddly to use. Overall, very happy with it. Works with the Samsung Health app, on a Samsung Galaxy S7.
customer_reviews.author: Pippinkid

customer_reviews.title: First time purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. Bought it to use with Samsung health app. Really please with the features and am enjoying the extra it brings to the Samsung health data
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Two died in a row
customer_reviews.text: First tracker died completely, had a nightmare of a time with Samsung who ‘repaired’ it - had to traipse into a town centre shop to drop off, then when it was fixed, to back and wait 40 minutes to collect it only for it to completely die again. Bought another and exactly the same thing happened. Shame as I liked it but would never buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Baglady

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my Samsung Galaxy Fit and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Definitely encourages you to keep moving and stay fit. Would be helpful if it gave slightly sooner notification that the battery requires charging. Overall very happy and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch because I wanted to monitor my calorie burning. In general, it does the job fine. It's slightly annoying that it doesn't synchronise with the app constantly (this is useful for the weather feedback). It also randomly pauses while you are walking. Sleep monitoring is fine and it looks smart enough to wear it anytime. I think for the price I payed is reasonable ok, but I wouldn't say I am 100% satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 20 mins then died!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today, so easy to set up and pair to my Samsung s20.....then 20 mins in the device stopped swiping and then completely stopped. Won't fire up so is going back for hopefully a replacement. Otherwise it looks and feels good on my wrist and hopefully the replacement will be fab!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this today after charging i can still not get it to turn on and display is black. It does vibrate when attached to charging dock and when holding power button but display remains off and because of not turning on will not connect to my phone
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Straps a little loose, but screen is good and seems accurate. Good functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jayde Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest to be honest. Keeps freezing Doesnt track completely right either Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tracket
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within 24 hours or ordering in perfect condition. So easy to pair with the phone (J6).My wife is looking forward to connecting calories eaten with steps etc.
customer_reviews.author: A P Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't charge.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use as it wouldn't charge. Sent it back and got a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Morna

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant  value
customer_reviews.text: Just love this product does the same as a fit bit but so much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Kay Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Galaxy Fit. Syncs with my phone (Samsung S6). Regularly measures my heart rate which is good when I'm walking or cycling. The app can be used for calorie counting and between the two I've been able to really up my health and fitness. Comfortable to wear. The strap can be easily changed with other coloured straps or a metal strap, as I have. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia x

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it if you have an iPhone
customer_reviews.text: IPhone App refuses to connect to it so unusable. Had to use a relatives Android phone, as they work fine on them, to update the firmware. It then connected to my phone and app finally but not daughters phone whose watch it is. Went back to my phone as a temporary measure but now refuses to sync again. Spent days retrying and no luck on all three iPhones all are suitable models...7 and above. The seller now only offers us 50% refund even though it’s unusable to us because he can sync it on an Android phone and an iPhone in his office.... not our phones so no good to us. Don’t bother unless you have an Android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Parmenter

customer_reviews.title: Love it hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for five days and so far I love it. Battery life is really good. Its measured my heart rate through running, aerobics and strength training. I love all the features, especially the sleep monitoring. I have it connected to my S9 and Samsung health app. All in all great fitness watch
customer_reviews.author: amz

customer_reviews.title: A Disappointing End
customer_reviews.text: I have just returned the Galaxy Fit to you as tje item completely died on me. Even the chargeable failed to connect. I was pleased until this happened. I am researching the field to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Better than fitbit 3
customer_reviews.text: Cool little toy but the skeeping and workouts tracker don't always work, however, having tried theexpensive fitbit 3, this is one is far better value for money
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone G.

customer_reviews.title: Stepping into fitness with Samsung.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it regularly and thinks it is very useful in her fitness drive.
customer_reviews.author: The Scrutineer.

customer_reviews.title: Small & very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great fitness tracker. Small & very lightweight. Love that it's suitable for swimming too.
customer_reviews.author: Devonshire Dumpling 67

customer_reviews.title: Great smart watch, dreadful fitness tracking
customer_reviews.text: Really been after an inexpensive, basic smart watch that would work as a fitness tracker. While this gives all the notifications I wanted (as wasn't bothered about being able to resoind) the fitness side was rubbish. The step counter only counts if you swing your arm while walking, so either doesn't track (if say your hands are in your pockets) or if you're doing something like cooking but but not walking it picks them up as steps. Major problem in my mind. Have sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helping
customer_reviews.text: Over the moon with this purchase. The watch lasts almost 1.5 days and is reliable. Offers the right level of monitoring and exercises. Only issue is the price of wireless charger for it.
customer_reviews.author: Paramjit

customer_reviews.title: Better than all the others
customer_reviews.text: Use many samsungs over the years..even though their are bigger more expensive versions i prefer this one. All the info i need and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: jsarg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this watch when it arrived. I had previously had a Garmin which I liked but I preferred the price and look of this watch. It worked great for almost two months then just stopped. No display, no link to the samsung app, no response to the charger. Truly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marj

customer_reviews.title: Good price with maximum capabilities.
customer_reviews.text: Item is very neat and looks sleak. Perfect for tracking fitness at inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIAN BCL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I chose to upgrade from the galaxy fit e to this galaxy fit. It's super comfy to wear and looks great. Battery performance is amazing and it's full of features I would expect on a higher priced piece of kit. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Noble

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great fitness tracker. Can't get over how many features are on it and for such a reasonable price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Samsung quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and quality. Works as intended. Bought for my daughter who loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael Brooks

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Fit - Silver Activity Tracker UK Version
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Silver| Style Name:UK VersionSlim, lightweight and compact, the Samsung Galaxy Fit is the perfect fitness companion. With a long-lasting battery and Auto Workout Tracking, you can track your activity levels and heart rate from your wrist each day. From a leisurely stroll or gym workout to a well-earned night's sleep, Galaxy Fit is designed for the life you lead. 

What's in the box: Samsung Galaxy Fit, UK charger, user manual.
feature_bullets: DESIGN AND COMFORT: experience a slim, lightweight design that looks as good as it feels
FITNESS TRACKING: track your activity levels from your wrist throughout the day
WELLNESS PARTNER: improve the way you live, eat and sleep
AUTOMATIC WORKOUT DETECTION: Galaxy Fit helps you achieve your goals with Auto Workout Tracking and Heart Rate Alerts that let you know when you need to speed up or slow down
WHAT'S IN THE BOX: Samsung Galaxy Fit, UK charger, user manual

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
